info.title: PublicanCreators
info.subtitle: A GUI helper for RedHat's publican

abstract.para: Publican is a generator for DocBook projects. Because of publican is shipped as command line tool the project PublicanCreators was launched. It uses yad to ask for the title and some project details. Also it haves a config file where you can store some global settings that aren't project specific. There you can store your name, company details, your business or private publican brands and so on.

para.note: This Rubygem is written for a Linux system. It will maybe not work on Windows or MacOS.
